description: This file defines a React component named Sidebar, which renders a navigation sidebar with links to different routes and external documentation. It includes a sub-component NavItem for individual navigation items, with logic to highlight the active route based on the current URL path.

classes.name: NavItem
classes.description: A React component that renders a navigation link with active state styling based on current URL.

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: Main React functional component that renders the sidebar with navigation links and an external docs link.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: Component that renders a navigation link with icon and label, highlights if active.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Component that renders the entire sidebar with navigation sections and external links.
